AFRO RESTAURANT

Afro Deli is an urban fast-casual restaurant that provides a delicious fusion of African, Mediterranean, and American themed food in a fast, fun, and friendly environment

We also cater all types of events

No matter small or large, we can accomodate your next event. We can create a customized meal that will adhere to every dietary need. Think of us for your next wedding, conference, or other large event
